description: Creative Enzymes performs the most reliable measurement of enzyme activities for a variety of application purposes. The unique technology platform provides accurate and reproducible results on the activity levels. In addition, our vast library of enzymes and their substrate and cofactors ensure fast activity determination in large batches. With state-of-the-art analytical instruments and data management, we are able to satisfy your unique requests on activity measurement, including cGMP and cGLP compliant services. Altogether, the knowledge, technology, and hardware mark the worldwide leading position of Creative Enzymes in the service of enzyme activity measurement.
name: Enzyme Activity Measurement
